reviews.text:
Max Exteriors went above and beyond for me and my family. They replaced our roof, fence, and gutters, and the quality of their work was exceptional. Compared to so many other companies I’ve dealt with, the level of care and attention they showed was on another level.
Jeremiah and Ramon made us feel like family from day one. They genuinely cared about making sure everything was taken care of, and it showed in every step of the process. Their communication, professionalism, and follow-through left

Max exteriors LLC did a great job on my new roof. The whole team was so professional. They also cleaned up all the debris after they finish the job. I am very pleased with the work that they done and a special thank you to Nate and Alex for always keeping an open line of communication while completing the job. I highly recommend max exteriors LLC.

Max Exteriors is an Amazing Company, very honest and do a great job. They replaced our roof, gutters, fence and garage door after the hail storm in Anna. They came out and worked with us when a time was good for us. Got everything done within a couple of weeks, plus went above and beyond what a contractor should do. Shout out to Jeremiah and Ramon for making everything go smoothly! They have a great group of workers too, very fast and cleaned everything up like new!
Highly Recommend!

Max Exteriors are the best we could have ever hoped for. We interviewed tons of roofers who came to our home after a hailstorm. These were the only people who never talked money. We never felt pressured and Jerimiah held our hand through the whole insurance process. To top it off, I have called several times over the past the past few weeks and Jerimiah is always available for questions. He even went over all the insurance paperwork with us. He does exactly what he says he will do, he takes care

These are the done photos of my roof after the hail storm. The company is now trying to come after me for additional money they requested from my insurance when they didn't even do the repairs they claimed with my insurance. Company employees even agree that they ruined my roof. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. I even let them come back to look at it to make it right and all I get is my boss says no tlits too much money for them to fix it. So if this is the work you want done and treatment you like, there ar

I have to leave a 5 star because they give 5 star quality. There was a leak in my new roof and they HONORED their job. Not many people do that these days. But they did. And came out on a SUNDAY afternoon to fix it. They repaired the ceiling and they repaired the roof. They are cool people. And I recommend Max Exteriors to anyone looking for roof work. I recommended them to a friend of mine and they fixed him up too. A+ on ethics and very quick to return phone calls.

Andres was AMAZING from start to finish! He stayed on top of my insurance when they dropped the ball and dragged their feet for over a month. He kept an open line of communication with me the whole time and when they came to put on the roof this morning his crew was absolutely awesome making sure no nails or trash was left behind. Very polite and patient. Highly recommend this company!

I want to start by saying: I did not do business with this company — and here’s why.

It was 6 PM on a Friday when my boyfriend and I were startled by someone knocking very aggressively on our back door. Not the front door. A young man named Diego had walked through our yard and approached the back of our house like he owned the place — knocking like the police to try and sell us services.

This company’s representative didn’t just cross a boundary — he walked right past it. I understand door-to

Pablo treated me like family and gave me the absolute best service I could ask for. Anytime I had a question he was there to pick up my phone call day and night. My truck came out just like it did when I left the dealership. Couldn’t ask for better service from Max Exteriors! Ask for Pablo!

I’m satisfied of the good job they did on my roof. I’m definitely going to recommend Max Exteriors to my friends/family/neighbors !

The person who assisted with my roofing claim is Juan Torres!

The gentlemen with Max Exteriors and Body Repair treated my husband and I with FIRST CLASS SERVICE! They’ve definitely did everything they could to gain our service and were extremely professional. I am grateful for all of their help during a stressful time. Pablo Degaldo was also very personable and gave SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SUPPORT! Thanks guys for everything!

pablo was great, had a damaged vehicle and he brought it back like i got it off the lot, spotless, customer service was outstanding he was very personable, and always got back to me when i had questions just overall remarkable service 10/10 would recommend

I used this company after the hail storm damaged our roof. They worked with my insurance company and and the claim was approved right away. They were also able to complete a number of other home improvement projects that I wanted done.
- Roof Repair - They came day they were scheduled and was able to complete the new roof the same day and it looks great. No leaks found after the recent rains. They removed/reinstalled my solar panels in a timely manner with no damage to them. A roof that I can pr
Alex was awesome, thank you guys so much. Highly recommend  max exteriors to handle your renovations!

Thank you Max Exteriors for getting my roof replaced. It was a pleasure working Alex, the sales rep. Everything done perfect and in a timely manner and I am very happy with the way the work turned out. I highly recommend this place to anyone thats looking to get any type of home renovation or car work done! Once again, thank you guys so much!

This company is amazing!! They are fast, clean and professional! Andres was so helpful and stayed in constant communication with me every step of the way. They understand how the economy is right now and they worked with me to get us the best price possible. I would give 10 stars if I could!  I highly recommend Max Exteriors!

Andres Diaz and Max Exteriors did an incredible job. They are ethical, considerate, compassionate and kind.  They ensured that the process was smooth and simple. They completed the job in one day and made sure to clean up behind themselves. They treated my home as if it was their own home. I would use this company again and again

When I first called Max Exteriors and spoke to Angel, the Project Manager, I knew I had made the right choice! Angel was professional, caring and really did a great job explaining to me the whole process of filing a claim with my insurance. Angel met with my insurance agent and the inspector to go over all the damage that was caused by the storm from the prior week. Thanks to Angel and his inspector they caught even more damage that was caused by the storm. When my insurance had agreed to get th

We just finished having a new roof installed by Max Exteriors and are extremely pleased from start to finish. Angel knocked on our door after the hail storm.  He determined we needed a new roof. Our insurance company denied us at first. Angel was persistent and asked for another inspection. That time it was approved. Angel took care of every step with the insurance company. That was wonderful. The cleanup after the roof was meticulously done. Angel is very professional, courteous, and  thorough.

Our concern was laying a quality shingle and keeping a clean uncluttered work area. They did. In our neighborhood he completed many roof work. It was good to see his work and talk with homeowners. Our project was set for a day two weeks out and they were all there on time and completed in one day as he planned. I would highly recommend his company for your business. Thank you so very much
